Matt Henderson (Brinton Chalke) is happy to be returning to Apple Hill after appearing in Butterflies Are Free earlier this season. He has performed with several theatre companies in the Pittsburgh area, including Bricolage (B.U.S., Midnight Radio, Speech & Debate, Weightless), City Theatre (the Young Playwrights Festival), 12 Peers Theater (Colorado), No Name Players (Fixing King John), Off the Wall (boom), Saint Vincent Summer Theatre (Suite Surrender), and Prime Stage (Walk Two Moons, The Scarlet Letter, The Westing Game), Cup-A-Jo Productions (Hospitality Suite), Throughline Theatre Company (The Farnsworth Invention), and TACT (Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead).
